mapper.select: with sub as ( SELECT mstr.POLL_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(mstr.QESITM_SN order by FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM asc separator ",") as QESITM_SN, sub.POLL_STATUS FROM COMTNBBSPOOLATDRN mstr LEFT JOIN COMTNBBSPOOLMANAGE sub ON mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID AND mstr.USER_ID = sub.USER_ID WHERE mstr.USER_ID = #{uniqId} GROUP BY mstr.POLL_ID ) SELECT mstr.POLL_ID, sub2.POLL_NM, mstr.POLL_BGNDE as startDate, mstr.POLL_ENDDE as endDate, case when sub.POLL_STATUS is null then 'todo' else sub.POLL_STATUS end as status, case when cast(mstr.POLL_ENDDE as date) < now() then true else false end expired FROM COMTNBBSPOLL mstr LEFT JOIN sub ON mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID LEFT JOIN COMTNBBSPOLL sub2 ON mstr.POLL_ID = sub2.POLL_ID WHERE mstr.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY mstr.POLL_ID
select POLL_ID, POLL_NM, POLL_BGNDE as startDate, POLL_ENDDE as endDate, case when cast(POLL_ENDDE as date) < cast(now() as date) then true else false end as expired from COMTNBBSPOLL

with sub as ( select mstr.POLL_ID, GROUP_CONCAT(concat(sub.QESITM_SN, ':', sub.QESITM_ANSWER, '/', sub.QESITM_ANSWER_IMAGE) order by FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM asc separator ",") as QESITM_SN, mstr.QESITM_SN_LIST, mstr.POLL_STATUS from COMTNBBSPOOLMANAGE mstr left join COMTNBBSPOOLATDRN sub on mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID and mstr.USER_ID = sub.USER_ID where mstr.USER_ID = #{uniqId} and mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId} group by mstr.POLL_ID ) select mstr.POLL_ID, mstr.POLL_NM, mstr.POLL_BGNDE as startDate, mstr.POLL_ENDDE as endDate, mstr.TEMP_SAVE as isSave, mstr.VOICE_SUP as isVoice, case when sub.POLL_STATUS is null then 'todo' else sub.POLL_STATUS end as status, sub.QESITM_SN, sub.QESITM_SN_LIST from COMTNBBSPOLL mstr left join sub on mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID where mstr.USE_AT = 'Y' and mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId}

select a.POLL_ID as pollId, a.QESITM_SN as qesitmSn, a.QESITM_SJ as qesitmSj, a.QESITM_ANSWER_TEXT as qesitmAnswerText, a.QESITM_ANSWER_IMAGE as qesitmAnswerImage from COMTNBBSPOOLQESITM a where POLL_ID = #{pollId}
mapper.insert: insert into COMTNBBSPOLLSCORE ( select b.USER_ID, 'GM' as QESITM_ANSWER_TYPE, sum(b.QESITM_ANSWER) / count(b.QESITM_ANSWER) as score from COMTNBBSPOOLQESITM a left join COMTNBBSPOOLATDRN b on a.POLL_ID = b.POLL_ID and a.QESITM_SN = b.QESITM_SN and b.USER_ID = #{uniqId} where QESITM_ANSWER_TYPE = 'GM' )

insert into COMTNBBSPOLLSCORE ( select b.USER_ID, 'IBP' as QESITM_ANSWER_TYPE, sum(5 - b.QESITM_ANSWER) / count(b.QESITM_ANSWER) as POLL_SCORE from COMTNBBSPOOLQESITM a left join COMTNBBSPOOLATDRN b on a.POLL_ID = b.POLL_ID and a.QESITM_SN = b.QESITM_SN and b.USER_ID = #{uniqId} where QESITM_ANSWER_TYPE = 'IBP' union all select b.USER_ID, 'EBP' as QESITM_ANSWER_TYPE, sum(5 - b.QESITM_ANSWER) / count(b.QESITM_ANSWER) as score from COMTNBBSPOOLQESITM a left join COMTNBBSPOOLATDRN b on a.POLL_ID = b.POLL_ID and a.QESITM_SN = b.QESITM_SN and b.USER_ID = #{uniqId} where QESITM_ANSWER_TYPE = 'EBP' )

insert into COMTNBBSPOLLSCORE ( select b.USER_ID, 'EK' as QESITM_ANSWER_TYPE, sum(case when b.QESITM_ANSWER = sub.answer then 1 else 0 end) as score from COMTNBBSPOOLQESITM a left join COMTNBBSPOOLATDRN b on a.POLL_ID = b.POLL_ID and a.QESITM_SN = b.QESITM_SN and b.USER_ID = #{uniqId} left join ( select 1 as QESITM_SN, 2 as answer union all select 2 as QESITM_SN, 1 as answer union all select 3 as QESITM_SN, 4 as answer union all select 4 as QESITM_SN, 2 as answer ) as sub on a.QESITM_SN = sub.QESITM_SN where QESITM_ANSWER_TYPE = 'EK' )
mapper.select: select count(*) from COMTNBBSPOOLQESITM mstr where mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId}
select CASE WHEN count(*) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as userExists from COMTNMBER where USER_ID = #{uniqId}

select a.POLL_ID as pollId, a.POLL_NM as pollNm, a.POLL_BGNDE as startDate, a.POLL_ENDDE as endDate, case when cast(POLL_ENDDE as date) < cast(now() as date) then true else false end as expired from COMTNBBSPOLL a where POLL_ID = #{pollId}
mapper.update: update COMTNMBER set SCHUL_CODE = #{userSpaceOrgInfo}, ST_GRADE = #{gradeNm}, ST_CLASS = #{classNm}, SEXDSTN = #{sex}, BRTHDY = #{brthdy} where USER_ID = #{uniqId}
